long_desc: There is a royal bodyguard here, ready to die for the Emperor, if necessary.
flags_raw: The bodyguard is dressed in the finest of armor and wields only the
stats1_raw: deadliest of weapons.  He is very strong and would put up one hell
stats2_raw: of a fight.  He has been trained to be suspicious of all but the
stats3_raw: most innocent visitors, and likely to take offense of anyone with
